name: Noxus
declaringWar: Don't turn Your back.. or Risk exposing your neck..
attacked: Defy Noxus and you will taste your Blood
defeated: History forgets, But the black rose remembers..
introduction: You have our attention... Do not Disappoint..
neutralHello: Speak, if your words hold weight.

hateNo: Terrible , And that is being generous

hateYes: It seems you value your life
